comments.text: Change the tree builder to report the error correctly when viewing source and non-white space is seen before the doctype. (Might be a perf problem if done naively.)
comments.raw_text: Change the tree builder to report the error correctly when viewing source and non-white space is seen before the doctype. (Might be a perf problem if done naively.)

comments.text:
Bulk-downgrade of unassigned, >=5 years untouched DOM/Storage bugs' priority and severity.

If you have reason to believe this is wrong, please write a comment and ni :jstutte.
